text.p: Write a Python function that returns a list of keys in aDict with the value target. The list of keys you return should be sorted. You may also assume that keys and values in aDict are integers or strings. (If aDict does not contain the value target, you should return an empty list.)
This function takes in a dictionary and an integer or string and returns a sorted list.
text.pre: def keysWithValue(aDict, target): ''' aDict: a dictionary target: an integer or string ''' # Your code here

codeparam.initial_display: def keysWithValue(aDict, target): ''' aDict: a dictionary target: an integer or string ''' # Your code here
